titles.title: Angels from the Realms of Glory

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Angels, from the realms of glory, wing your flight o'er all the earth; ye, who sang creation's story, now proclaim Messiah's birth: come and worship, come and worship, worship Christ, the newborn King!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Shepherds, in the fields abiding, watching o'er your flocks by night, God with man is now residing; yonder shines the infant Light: come and worship, come and worship, worship Christ, the newborn King!

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Saints before the altar bending, watching long in hope and fear, suddenly the Lord, descending, in His temple shall appear: come and worship, come and worship, worship Christ, the newborn King!
